name: Halloween Hop
description:
A witch has cursed you, the player, in two ways: one, you have assumed the form of a pumpkin – and two, gravity is reversed around you! You need to survive as long as you can by jumping from platform to platform and avoiding hazards like floating knives and fireballs. Don't fall to your doom!

Created for the 2018 Wolverine Soft Pumpkin Jam by:

  • Trenton Geordt
  • Aaron Balestrero
  • Tai Ramaswamy
  • B Mark-Ockerbloom
